```{r, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

params<-list(
  version= '0.2',
  modules = c( 'Data, Pre-processing, Statistics, Clustering, Dimensional reduction, Pathway analysis, Predictive modeling, Network analysis, Reporting'))

library(shiny)
library(dave.help)
mods<-parse_modules(params$modules) #
htmltools::tagList(rmarkdown::html_dependency_font_awesome()) # required for icons
```



`r module_title('DAVe: Data Analysis and Visualization engine')`

`r place_fig(normalizePath("../img/dave.main/full.png"))`

Welcome to DAVe, the application which interactively combines statistics, clustering, data explortaion and visualization with machine learning, functional and network analysis to create information and context rich mapped networks. The following manual describes a selection of available workflows. Get ready to connect your data with context!


<br>


```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics(normalizePath("../img/dave.main/nav.png"))
```



<hr>

DAVe is comprised of `r mods$length` modules covering: `r grammatical_paste(mods$modules) %>% tolower()` domains.
Each module may contain `calculate/summary`, `explore`, `plot` and `report` components.
